title: Straight Time Hours Paid for but Not Worked, Railroad Employees for Whom Hours Are Reported for United States
notes:
Data Include Switching And Terminal Companies Until 1933. Data Include All Hourly Reported Occupations Including Train And Engine Source: Computed By NBER By Subtracting Series (Straight Time Hours Worked) From Total Hours Paid, Icc "Wage Statistics".

This NBER data series m08176 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08176
